text: Several taxa of butterflies are collectively called the Sulphurs or Sulfurs: * Coliadinae, a subfamily of butterflies commonly known as the sulphurs or yellows * Dercas, a genus of Coliadinae commonly called the sulphurs * Colias, a genus of Coliadinae commonly called the sulphurs (in North America) or clouded yellows (elsewhere) * Phoebis, a genus of Coliadinae that is not itself called the sulphurs but that contains a number of species which are Category:Animal common name disambiguation pages
title: Sulfur butterfly
